suite.name: Gherkin Login

kw.name: Given browser is opened to login page
Selenium2Library.Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.

kw.name: When user "demo" logs in with password "mode"
Selenium2Library.Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: resource.Then welcome page should be open
Selenium2Library.Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc:
A test suite with a single Gherkin style test.
This test is functionally identical to the example in valid_login.txt file.

suite.name: Invalid Login

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.

test.name: Invalid Username

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided URL.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.

kw.name: Login With Invalid Credentials Should Fail
Selenium2Library.Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.msg: Title should have been 'Error Page' but was 'Market Summary'

test.status: Title should have been 'Error Page' but was 'Market Summary'

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc:
A test suite containing tests related to invalid login.
These tests are data-driven by their nature. They use a single keyword, specified with Test Template setting, that is called with different arguments to cover different scenarios.
This suite also demonstrates using setups and teardowns in different levels.

suite.name: Valid Login

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals `title`.

kw.name: Selenium2Library.Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc:
A test suite with a single test for valid login.
This test has a workflow that is created using keywords in the imported resource file.
